content: this is a very beginner friendly ear warmer headband it s so easy but it s so cute this pattern includes an 4 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s s-l any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #5 bulky yarn i used patons alpaca blend #5 bulky yarn crochet hook size 6 mm scissors yarn needle notes this pattern made as us women s sizes s m l in this picture i have demonstrated with size m yarn needed 70 80 90 yards gauge 12 half_double_crochet x 9 row = 4″ sizes and measurements s smaller heads = 17 77 circumference stretches out to 21 x 5 33 tall m fit most women = 18 66 circumference stretches out to 22 x 5 33 tall l lager heads = 19 55 circumference stretches out to 23 x 5 33 tall thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
